```{r}
# Network analysis of players interactions

library(BasketballAnalyzeR)
options(ggrepel.max.overlaps = Inf)
PbP <- PbPmanipulation(PbP.BDB)
table(PbP$team)
subdata <- subset(PbP, team == "GSW")
net <- assistnet(subdata)

net$assistTable
net$nodeStats
net$assistNet

set.seed(123)


```

```{r}
plot(net,
     node.size='ASTPTS',
     node.col='FGPTS_AST')


```

```{r}
plot(net,
     node.size='ASTPTS',
     node.col='FGPTS_AST',
     layout = 'circle',
     edge.thr = 20)
```

```{r}
# NBA Team & Player Performance Analysis

library(BasketballAnalyzeR)
```

```{r}
# Teams
str(Tbox)
data <- data.frame(Tbox[,c(1,4,9, 12, 15, 16)])
labs <- c("% 2-point shots made",
          "% 3-point shots made",
          "% free throws made",
          'Points')
```

```{r}

bubbleplot(data, id="Team", 
           x="P2p", 
           y="P3p", 
           col="FTp",
           size = 'PTS',
           labels=labs)
```

```{r}
# Players
str(Pbox)
data <- Pbox
data <- subset(Pbox, Team =="Boston Celtics" & MIN>=500)
data <- data.frame(data[, c(1, 2, 5, 8, 11, 14)])
labs <- c("% 2-point shots made",
          "% 3-point shots made",
          "% free throws made",
          "Points")

```

```{r}
```

```{r}
bubbleplot(data, id="Player", 
           x="P2p", 
           y="P3p", 
           col="FTp",
           size="PTS",
           labels=labs,
           text.size=2)
```

```{r}
# compare players from 2 teams

# options(ggrepel.max.overlaps = Inf)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggrepel)
data <- Pbox
data <- subset(Pbox, Team =="Boston Celtics" | Team=='Golden State Warriors' &  MIN>=500)
data <- data.frame(data[, c(1, 2, 5, 8, 11, 14)])
labs <- c("% 2-point shots made",
          "% 3-point shots made",
          "% free throws made",
          "Points")


bubbleplot(data, id="Player", 
           x="P2p", 
           y="P3p", 
           col="FTp",
           size="PTS",
           labels=labs,
           text.size=2)
```
